channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office

item.title: CVE-2022-24114|2024-08-03T03:59:23.673Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to race condition on application startup. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (macOS) before build 39605, Acronis True Image 2021 (macOS) before build 39287

item.title: CVE-2022-24115|2024-08-03T03:59:23.626Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to unrestricted loading of unsigned libraries. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (macOS) before build 39605, Acronis True Image 2021 (macOS) before build 39287

item.title: CVE-2022-4418|2024-08-03T01:41:44.656Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to unrestricted loading of unsigned libraries. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40208.
